text: "A Face in the Crowd" is a 1990 song by Tom Petty and is the fourth single from his debut studio album Full Moon Fever. It went to number 46 in the United States, number 93 in the United Kingdom, number 20 in Canada and number 25 in the Netherlands. ==References== Category:Tom Petty songs Category:1990 songs Category:1990s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Heartland rock songs
title: A Face in the Crowd (Tom Petty song)
